channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Breville Oracle Touch is down 37% for Click Frenzy, but you’ll need to act fast to snap up these savings
item.description: The Breville Oracle Touch is one seriously talented bean-to-cup espresso machine, and it's now had over AU$1,300 slashed from its price in this early Black Friday deal.

item.title: Red Bull Racing’s secret weapon? An engineer who treats workflows like lap times
item.description: Lauren Mekies spent much of his career in the engineering trenches. His approach to winning reflects that technical background, too.

item.title: Football Manager 26 is incredibly rough around the edges, but it still retains that moreish core gameplay loop
item.description: Football Manager 26 is the biggest revamp in series' history, but it's essentially an alpha for next year's game. Unless you're a die-hard fan, you're likely better off sticking with FM 24.

item.title: What is the release date for Maxton Hall season 2 episode 4 on Prime Video?
item.description: James and Ruby are left in limbo ahead of Maxton Hall season 2 episode 4, but when is it coming to Prime Video?
